revised_title: Gravitational Aspects of Conformally Coupled Field Theory in Five Space-Time Dimensions
tldr: The article investigates a conformally coupled scalar field theory in five space-time dimensions, exploring the gravitational aspects and how the Newtonian and cosmological constants may be influenced by the presence of an electromagnetic field. The study considers both untwisted and twisted fields and examines the effects of symmetry breaking and vacuum solutions on the field theory.
